criteria.name: Technical Evaluation
criteria.description: Assesses contrast administration, image quality, and technical factors.

scoring_guide.0: No mention of technical factors or contrast
scoring_guide.1: Mentions contrast but incomplete technical assessment
scoring_guide.2: Comprehensive evaluation of contrast, slice thickness, and image quality

criteria.rationale: Technical assessment ensures reliable interpretation and identifies study limitations.

criteria.name: Solid Organ Assessment
criteria.description: Systematic evaluation of liver, spleen, pancreas, and kidneys.

scoring_guide.1: Partial organ evaluation or missing key organs
scoring_guide.2: Complete evaluation of all solid organs with size, enhancement, and pathology

criteria.rationale: Solid organ assessment is fundamental to abdominal CT interpretation.

criteria.name: Bowel and Mesentery
criteria.description: Evaluates bowel loops, mesentery, and vascular structures.

scoring_guide.1: General mention of bowel without specific assessment
scoring_guide.2: Detailed evaluation of bowel wall, lumen, and mesenteric structures

criteria.rationale: Bowel evaluation is crucial for detecting obstruction, inflammation, and ischemia.

criteria.name: Pathology Characterization
criteria.description: Identifies and characterizes pathological findings with measurements.

scoring_guide.2: Detailed characterization with measurements, enhancement, and location

criteria.rationale: Accurate pathology characterization guides treatment planning and follow-up.

criteria.name: Differential Diagnosis
criteria.description: Provides appropriate differential diagnosis based on findings.
criteria.rationale: Focused differential diagnosis guides further workup and management.

criteria.name: Clinical Impression and Recommendations
criteria.description: Provides prioritized impression with management recommendations.

scoring_guide.2: Prioritized impression with specific follow-up recommendations

criteria.rationale: Clear impression and recommendations guide clinical decision-making.
